## Source: ossf-package-analysis (28e7be23ba9caf66d89c4659d66001871cf1901098bdab6dd4dd8630d476a991)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@hornetsecurity/angular-pew-pew' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
